name: Echo of the Last Light
description:
Student Collaboration With the University of Utah:


The Fat Bear Society, a studio consisting of 2 producers, 5 artists, 5 engineers, 4 designers, and 2 musicians, worked for 28 weeks to deliver Echo of the Last Light. This 3D action-adventure puzzle game was created in a simulated-studio environment at the Graduate Games Lab at the University of Utah, but the project is 100% student-run and student-owned. Prepare to be blown away by our incredible non-profit project!

Overview:


In a world where The Echoes used to light up the sky, the last light is your only hope. Together with the Echo, a creature of light, you embark on a mission to rescue the world from the encroaching darkness. Will you save the world or become consumed by the Abyss?

In Echo of the Last Light, you will explore a beautiful yet perilous world, team up with a mysterious creature, and engage in combat against the enemies of The Royal Eclipse. With a captivating story, puzzles, and thrilling action, this game seamlessly blends exploration, combat, and adventure. Collaborate with your companion to unlock new abilities and uncover hidden secrets in the world.

Play as Tamasis, Humble Light Follower


In Echo of the Last Light, you play as Tamasis, a follower of The Humble Light, a group of moths dedicated to preserving the world's light. Your mission is to find the only remaining source of light, a creature that becomes your companion. You must bring the last light to The Tree of Humble Light to save the world from The Royal Eclipse, who seeks its destruction. Along the way, you will team up with The Last Light, fight the enemies of The Royal Eclipse, and uncover secrets that will alter the world's fate.

Fight Enemies With Your Companion


Join forces with your trusty companion to overcome challenging puzzles and take down the enemies of The Royal Eclipse in Echo of the Last Light. With the Echo ability, you'll be able to uncover hidden secrets and see what others cannot. Collaborate with your companion to use your enhanced abilities to your advantage, and work together to fight your way through hordes of enemies.

Uncover Secrets in The World, What Cannot Be Seen


Your companion possesses a powerful Echo ability that reveals hidden elements in the world. As you journey through the world, you will learn how to command the companion and take advantage of this ability, allowing you to uncover hidden parts of the world and enemy weaknesses. By using this ability to your advantage, you'll be able to navigate complex puzzles, overcome The Royal Eclipse, and ultimately determine the fate of the world. Whether you're exploring the mysterious landscapes or engaging in fast-paced combat, Echo of the Last Light offers a unique and immersive experience that will keep you engaged from start to finish and leave you with lingering questions…what are you willing to give up to save the world? Whose freedom is truly at risk? And what beliefs are worth fighting for, even when they may hurt some beings?
